sentences.sContent: The countryside near there is flat as a pancake (= very flat ) .
sentences.sCn: 那儿附近的乡间地势非常平坦。

sentences.sContent: Work on a clean, flat surface.
sentences.sCn: 在干净、平整的台面上工作。

sentences.sContent: ...The report finds more than a quarter of the countries experienced flat or falling monthly wages in real terms...
...The driver stops the car on a flat platform and gets out...
...And the survey found flat demand for fitness monitors...
...But with wages still relatively flat and the economy increasingly divided between the well-off and the long-term unemployed...
...are paintings of many flat sheeting animals...
...She injured her spine in a fall and a doctor told her to lie flat on her back for a month so it can mend...

synos.tran: 平坦的；扁平的；浅的；单调的

phrases.pCn: v. 竭尽全力；用全速；疲惫
潮滩；潮汐平原；潮汐舱内甲板；潮汐滩
平筛，平板筛浆机；平面屏幕
没精打采；漏了气的车胎
卧倒；引不起兴趣；完全失败

words.tran: 断然地；平平地；直截了当地
合住一套公寓的人；合租者

trans.tranOther: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving
a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building
